headline: Rollins (ROL) Is Down 10.5% After Q4 Miss Despite Recurring Strength And Active M&A Plans
summary: Earlier this week, Rollins, Inc. reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, with net income rising to US$116.44 million for the quarter and US$526.71 million for the year, yet revenue and earnings per share came in below Wall Street expectations despite 9.7% year-on-year sales growth. Management attributed much of the quarterly shortfall to early winter weather dampening one-time project demand, while highlighting healthy recurring revenue trends and a continued focus on M&A,...
